{{Wired embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TD-8817 |revision=v3.2 |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=EoL |est_release_date=09/2009 |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |pcb_id= |type=dsl modem |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=TrendChip |cpu1_model=TC3162LE;TC3162LE-LQ128G, D4JGH.1, UG0937D2-H; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=SST25VF0168-50-4C-S2AF |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (slave) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=DSL (ADSL2+) AFE;TrendChip;TC3086;TRENDCHIP, TC3086-QFN64-EPG, C0S831.00, TG0936B5;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot=Bootbase;VTC_SPI1.1; |stock_os=ZyNOS |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:27:19 }} The '''TP-LINK''' logo, "MODEL: ADSL2+ (TC) A", "REV: 2.1", and a date code :of '''0937''' is silkscreened on the board of a v3.20 unit. Per the serial logs below, this device would appear to be using '''ZyNOS'''. ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== The pinout would appear to be the following...
